actions.text: Amendment SA 3152 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 82 - 0. Record Vote Number: 95.

Amendment SA 3152 proposed by Senator Hutchison. (consideration: CR S5524-5527, S5529; text: CR S5525) To authorize medical and dental care for cadets and midshipmen, and to authorize disability benefits for cadets and midshipmen of the service academies,
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3152 proposed by Senator Hutchison.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Amendment SA 3152 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 82 - 0. Record Vote Number: 95.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3152 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 82 - 0. Record Vote Number: 95.

purpose: To authorize medical and dental care for cadets and midshipmen, and to authorize disability benefits for cadets and midshipmen of the service academies,
